name: Thicc Apple Tycoon: Definitive Edition
description:
Thicc Apple Tycoon: Definitive Edition is an idle tycoon revolving around growing increasingly upgraded and increasingly thicker apples in order to build a Thicc Apple Empire. Exhibit multiple upgrades for each apple type, increase your production, and discover new types of apples and various other fruits along the way. Once ready, commit to a powerful Rethiccen to restart with heavily increased production amounts and buffs to specific plants. Have a blast growing bigger apples, collecting enhancing items, idling, and making some very, very thicc apples.

Features include:

  • Buying new types of fruit droppers
  • Enhancing your production through thiccness, speed, and potency upgrades.
  • Find items to help boost your production more!
  • Level up to obtain decoration points to buy cool decorations.
  • Advance and unlock up to 9 different dropper types.
  • Explore three areas: Grasslands, Pumpkinville, and Frosty Poms.
  • Rethiccen to restart and boost your production even more, including unlocking gifted drops and item boosts!
  • More to come as development continues, including references to the original series of games.

This game is a passion project brought out by an original series of tycoon games made by me on a old Roblox revival, Finobe, which ran from May 2017 to early 2021.  I hold a lot of respect for those years, and hope to bring the Thicc Apple joke games back to life.

Want to learn more about the original series or find out details about Thicc Apple? Check out the dedicated wiki, https://thicc-apple-tycoon.fandom.com/wiki/Thicc_Apple_Tycoon_Wiki, or the reposts from my Roblox account, 4560were (display name Cuddles).

Discord server: https://discord.gg/JH6B9rW2pc

This game is in early development. This release is an alpha playtest release and does not possibly represent the full game as envisioned. Stay tuned for more updates to come.
